tokens.resolved_gloss: to jut over or exceed; by implication, to excel; (intransitively) to remain or be left; causatively to leave, cause to abound, preserve

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
